entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. Showers beginning early this evening. Risk of thundershowers late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:26 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:26 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:26 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
